code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Booking=_ref=>{let{token}=_ref;const[bookingDate,setBookingDate]=useState('');const[numberOfGuests,setNumberOfGuests]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const handleBooking=e=>{e.preventDefault();const headers={Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`};axios.post('/api/bookings',{booking_date:bookingDate,number_of_guests:numberOfGuests},{headers}).then(response=>{setMessage('Booking confirmed!');}).catch(err=>{setMessage('Error making booking');});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"booking-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Book a Table"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleBooking,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"datetime-local",value:bookingDate,onChange:e=>setBookingDate(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Number of Guests",value:numberOfGuests,onChange:e=>setNumberOfGuests(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Book"})]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message})]});};export default Booking;
